# status

**Instance Property**

The current status of the adaptive trigger and whether it’s applying effects.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: GCDualSenseAdaptiveTrigger.Status { get }
```

## Checking the status

- **GCDualSenseAdaptiveTrigger.Status**: The possible states of an adaptive trigger.
